parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 1.22

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Checks if the player has watch opened and visible. Keep in mind that the GPS minimap in <template><title>arma3</title></template> also shows the time.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> '''visibleWatch'''

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[visibleWatch]]) [[then]] {[[hint]] "Watch is visible"};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showWatch]], [[shownWatch]], [[visibleGPS]], [[visibleCompass]]
</value></part></template></root>
